title: GlobalMarket设置玩家上架数量
author: chaomeng
txt_content:
GlobalMarket设置玩家上架数量。我想设置玩家只能上架五样物品，和物品在一天后自动下架。求大神教
server:
  enable: false
automatic_payments: false
enable_cut: true
cut_amount: 0.05
enable_metrics: true
max_price: 0.0
creation_fee: 0.0
queue:
  trade_time: 0
  mail_time: 0
  queue_mail_on_buy: true
  queue_on_cancel: true
max_listings_per_player: 0
expire_time: 168
price_check:
  enable: true
infinite:
  seller: Server
  account: ''
notify_on_update: true
blacklist:
  item_name:
  - Transaction Log
  - Market History
  item_id:
    '0': 0
  enchant_id: []
  enchant_lore: []
  use_with_mail: false
英文完全看不懂

replies.author: chaomeng
replies.txt_content:
chaomeng 发表于 2015-7-14 09:04
快来人啊
